metadata.titleEn: Identification lists of palynomorphs from the Yalai Devonian-Carboniferous boundary section, Nielamu
metadata.titleCn: 聂拉木亚来泥盆系-石炭系界线剖面孢粉化石鉴定单
metadata.description: Palynomorphs from the Zhangdong and Yali formations at Yalai Devonian–Carboniferous boundary section, Nyalam (GPS coordinates: 86°7′0.54″E, 28°23′27.94″N) are investigated in detail during this study. Based on quantitative analysis of the relative abundances of various palynomorphs, two palynological assemblages are recognized in the Famennian-Tournaisian boundary beds of the Yalai section. In ascending order, they are the Retispora lepidophyta–Verrucosisporites irregularis (LI) assemblage and the Retispora lepidophyta–Vallatisporites vallatus (LV) assemblage. Both assemblages are tentatively correlated with the Famennian LN Biozone of Western Europe because of the appearance of Retispora lepidophyta and other index spores such as Vallatisporites verrucosus, Vallatisporites pusillites, Indotriradites explanatus, and Densosporites spitsbergensis in both palynological assemblages. The lower limestones of the Yali Formation yield biostratigraphic markers for the Devonian-Carboniferous boundary, including the conodont Siphonodella sulcata and Protognathodus kockeli, correlated with the Famennian VI Biozone from Western Europe. The palynomorphs assemblages have great significance for biostratigraphy subdivision ad correlation around the Devonian-Carboniferous boundary. This dataset include identification lists from the Yalai section.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本次研究系统报道了采自聂拉木县亚来剖面（GPS坐标：86°7′0.54″E, 28°23′27.94″N）泥盆系-石炭系界线层附近的章东组和亚里组中的孢粉化石组合。基于孢粉化石类型相对丰度定量分析，共识别出2个孢粉组合带，自下而上为Retispora lepidophyta–Verrucosisporites irregularis (LI) 组合带和Retispora lepidophyta–Vallatisporites vallatus (LV)组合带。鉴于两个组合带中均发育Retispora lepidophyta，以及其它标准化石分子，如Vallatisporites verrucosus, Vallatisporites pusillites, Indotriradites explanatus和Densosporites spitsbergensis等，我们将这两个组合带对应于西欧地区法门阶LN组合带。结合剖面上牙形生物地层研究成果，亚里组下部灰岩中发育泥盆系-石炭系界线层的标准分子Siphonodella sulcata和Protognathodus kockeli，表明亚里组下部灰岩大致对应于西欧地区法门阶VI孢粉组合带。聂拉木县亚来剖面中孢粉化石组合具有重要的生物地层意义。本数据集包括上述剖面的孢粉化石鉴定单。
metadata.instructions: File name consists of study area, section name and data type. Data stored in XLS format and can be opened by Microsoft Office Excel software.
metadata.instructionsCn: 文件名称由研究地点+剖面名称+数据类型组成，数据以xlsx格式存储，可以用Microsoft Office Excel软件打开读取。

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What methods are used to identify and analyze spore-pollen fossils in geological sections like the one at the Devonian-Carboniferous boundary?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在地质剖面（如泥盆纪-石炭纪边界）中，识别和分析孢子-花粉化石的方法包括以下几种：

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used for identifying and analyzing spore-pollen fossils at the Devonian-Carboniferous boundary sections?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于识别和分析德文纪-石炭纪边界剖面中孢子-花粉化石的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: A data collection method involves the systematic analysis of spore-pollen fossil assemblages from the Devonian-Carboniferous boundary sections at the Yalai profile in Nyalam County. This involves GPS-based site identification, followed by the extraction of samples from the Zhangdong and Yali formations. The method includes quantitative analysis of the relative abundance of spore-pollen fossil types to identify assemblage zones, such as the Retispora lepidophyta–Verrucosisporites irregularis (LI) assemblage zone and the Retispora lepidophyta–Vallatisporites vallatus (LV) assemblage zone.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种数据收集方法涉及对尼亚兰县雅来剖面德文纪-石炭纪边界段的孢子-花粉化石组合进行系统分析。这包括基于GPS的地点识别，随后从张东和雅里地层中提取样本。该方法包括对孢子-花粉化石类型相对丰度的定量分析，以识别组合区，如Retispora lepidophyta–Verrucosisporites irregularis (LI) 组合区和Retispora lepidophyta–Vallatisporites vallatus (LV) 组合区。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific features identified in a dataset related to the spore-pollen fossil assemblages at the Devonian-Carboniferous boundary section?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在与泥盆纪-石炭纪边界剖面相关的孢子-花粉化石组合的数据集中识别出的具体特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: Retispora lepidophyta, Verrucosisporites irregularis, Vallatisporites verrucosus, Vallatisporites pusillites, Indotriradites explanatus, Densosporites spitsbergensis
Feature Specification.AnswerCn:
Retispora lepidophyta：鳞叶网孢  
Verrucosisporites irregularis：不规则疣孢  
Vallatisporites verrucosus：疣状环孢  
Vallatisporites pusillites：小环孢  
Indotriradites explanatus：展平印度三辐孢  
Densosporites spitsbergensis：斯匹次卑尔根密孢

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many spore-pollen assemblage zones have been identified in a dataset related to the Devonian-Carboniferous boundary in the field of biostratigraphy?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在与泥盆纪-石炭纪边界相关的生物地层学数据集中，已识别出多少个孢子-花粉组合区？

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the identification and classification challenges of spore-pollen fossils in the Devonian-Carboniferous boundary sections?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在泥盆纪-石炭纪边界剖面中，导致孢子-花粉化石识别和分类挑战的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The identification and classification of spore-pollen fossils in the Devonian-Carboniferous boundary sections involve challenges due to the relative abundance of different fossil types and the need to recognize standard molecular fossils such as Retispora lepidophyta, Vallatisporites verrucosus, and others. These challenges are compounded by the necessity to correlate these findings with established biostratigraphic zones, such as the Famennian stage LN zone in Western Europe, and to align them with conodont biostratigraphy, which requires accurate identification of standard markers like Siphonodella sulcata and Protognathodus kockeli.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在泥盆纪-石炭纪边界剖面中，孢子-花粉化石的识别和分类面临挑战，这主要是由于不同化石类型的相对丰度以及需要识别标准分子化石，如Retispora lepidophyta、Vallatisporites verrucosus等。这些挑战还因需要将这些发现与已建立的生物地层区进行对比而加剧，例如西欧的法门尼阶LN区，并与牙形石生物地层进行对齐，这需要准确识别标准标记，如Siphonodella sulcata和Protognathodus kockeli。
